quote.quotepara: Copy libmysqlclient.so to /lib or /usr/lib and run 'ldconfig'

body.para: Now, it was still looking for the socket in a place where the MySQL RPM wasn't putting it, so I did a MYSQL_UNIX_PORT= and exported that, restarted mysqld and odbctest ran fine.
It runs fine, in fact, whether I've got an odbc.ini file in /root or not. (I'm running as root for this.) Is that normal, or is it looking for the odbc.ini file elsewhere?

Now that odbctest runs fine, what does that tell me about the status of my libmyodbc.so? It still doesn't seem to run with iHTML, but I'm hoping that's because I'm confused about where it's looking for odbc.ini.
